alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 27 at 3:09AM CDT until March 27 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Iowa, Dubuque and Jackson Counties. In Illinois, Jo Daviess County. The fog has become localized to the immediate areas of the Mississippi River in these counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Visibilities may change suddenly over very short distances.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
